title: The Bowl of Light: Ancestral Wisdom from a Hawaiian Shaman
description: In the oceanic islands where the flow of primal energies has created unparalleled natural beauty, one of the world's most advanced spiritual cultures remains largely unknown to the West. With The Bowl of Light, Hank Wesselman offers a privileged and intimate view into the mind of an authentic Hawaiian kahuna-- for the time has finally come for the world to hear the wisdom that this profound tradition offers.
author: Hank Wesselman
